metadata.synopsis: |Lae'zel Companion only: the player attacked the gith during 'PLA_GithChokepoint_ConfrontationLaezel', and Voss commanded Baretha to kill them all (the player + Lae'zel) OR, the situation naturally ended in combat. Lae'zel is betrayed, and this AD makes it clear to the player.|

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: Traitors to our queen: I will make you suffer!
0.context: NodeContext: Calls out after battle starts.
